input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Eating citrus has a direct effect on vitmain C. Vitmain C has a direct effect on curly hair. For patients not consuming citrus, the probability of curly hair is 33%. For patients consuming citrus, the probability of curly hair is 13%. Will citrus intake decrease the chance of curly hair?
